data.name: My Catgirl Maid Thinks She Runs the Place - Extra Fluffy Edition
data.detailed_description:
3 short stories exploring alternate worlds where the other girls and the MC start a relationship with each other. What type of romance would Madeline and the MC have? Would Miyu ever make her move? What if the cat the MC found wasn't Cynthia but Angelica? All of these get explored in the Extra Fluffy edition of the game.

Features
60,000+ additional word count.
3 new CG scenes, 1 for each story
More cute content
The MC continuing to be over his head with all this nonsense

Fair warning though. There are no choices in these bonus stories. Just pure reading.)

data.short_description: Exploring the "What if" scenario by placing the other girls as the main romance option.

fullgame.name: My Catgirl Maid Thinks She Runs the Place

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 422 MB available space
